episodes.title: Aiko Tanaka Guffaws at Spectrum
episodes.summary:
Aiko Tanaka joins Ku this week to talk about fixing credit scores, how leaving ketchup on your tooth can prevent you from getting laid and what a powerful baby Ku was. 

@aikotanaka

episodes.title: Roast Battler Albert Teacher Escobedo
episodes.summary:
Albert Escobedo joins Ku this week to talk about his experience teaching English in Korea and teaching Veterinarian school at the American College of Healthcare. Albert Escobedo is a comedian you've seen doing Roast Battle and teaches at Huntington Park Community College. 

@albertmescobedo

episodes.title: Emotional Inventory with Cory Fernandez
episodes.summary:
Cory Fernandez joins Ku this week to talk about having braces in college and they begin to process her mom's passing. Cory Fernandez was the first Puerto Rican to ever perform on Def Comedy Jam, has been in the movie Cop Out and on HBO. 

@coryfuckinfernandez

episodes.title: Aiko And The Giant Kiwi
episodes.summary:
Aiko Tanaka joins Ku this week to reminisce the times they've made grown men cry, why she doesn't eat kiwi's anymore, and how a prank in gym class ended in surgery. 

@aikotanaka

episodes.title: George Perez's Orange County Bounty
episodes.summary:
George Perez joins Ku this week to talk about working as a DJ in seven strip clubs, growing up in Orange County in the eighties, and the most difficult part of leaving prison. 

@georgepcomedy

episodes.title: That's So Retrograde's Stephanie Simbari and Elizabeth Kott
episodes.summary:
Stephanie Simbari and Elizabeth Kott from the That's So Retrograde podcast join Ku this week to brainstorm sketch ideas, talk about how to make a vision board, and what it's like to get a colonic. 

@stephsimbari

@elizabethkott

@soretrograde

episodes.title: Drinking a Tsingtao with Dave Juskow
episodes.summary:
Dave Juskow joins Ku this week to give his reaction to the Jewish Eeyore episode, share his story of how he almost got killed while hitting on a girl, and whether it's fun or mean to be mean. 

@DaveJuskow

episodes.title: Point of No Return With Jessica Stern
episodes.summary:
Comedian Jessica Stern and Ku talk about the technological advances that need to be made for high heels, why Ku's bedroom wall is lined with lockers and what surprises her most when she looks in the mirror. Jessica Stern is a NYC comedian who has been on The Wendy Williams Show, Discovery Channel and the movie Sisters. 

@Hustlin_giggles

episodes.title: Cocaine Cowboy's Billy Corben and LA's Bok Choy Yoshi Obayashi
episodes.summary:
Billy Corben and Yoshi Obayashi join Ku this week to talk about his bucket list, corruption in Florida politics and his upcoming project Cocaine Cowboys Los Muchachos. Billy Corben is the creator of Cocaine Cowboys, The U, Broke and several other award-winning documentaries. 

@BillyCorben 

@YoshiObayashi

episodes.title: Whatcha Gonna Do When Dwayne Gill Comes For You
episodes.summary:
Dwayne Gill joins Ku this week to give advice on what not to say when being pulled over by a cop, how cops are misrepresented on TV, and how he almost got shot as an undercover cop. Dwayne Gill currently works as a comedian and a Michigan State Trooper. He has been on ABC's Detroit 187, The Bob and Tom Show, and the movie Crave. 

@DwayneLGill

episodes.title: Up In The Air Tabigue
episodes.summary:
Air Tabigue and Ku sit down to talk about running marathons, working in a female dominated environment and Filipino culture. Air Tabigue is a NYC comedian from Long Island who has appeared on NBC, FOX, TFC, and an Asian America special on PBS.  

@airtabigue

episodes.title: The Plus Pierre and Kat Toledo Credo
episodes.summary:
Plus Pierre and Kat Toledo join Ku this week to talk about the voodoo powers of Haitians, do an impromptu game show on Jesus and find out which states have higher lithium content and what effect that has on crime. 

@_SirPlus

@Kat_Toledo

episodes.title: The Peter Bisuito Placebo
episodes.summary:
Peter Bisuito and Ku talk about what it means to be a Platinum Gay, the struggle of living two lives at once, and how Invisalign can improve one's sex life. Peter Busuito is a comedian whose been on Oprah and is currently trying to get on Ellen. 

@mybigfunnypeter

episodes.title: Jordan Carlos and Seth Herzog Go Analog
episodes.summary:
Jordan Carlos and Seth Herzog discuss the position of the equator, Brian Wilson's Smile album and very not near death experiences. Jordan Carlos is a comedian you may know from The Colbert Report, The Nightly Show with Larry Wilmore or Friends From College. Seth Herzog is a comedian you may know from The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, Role Models or The Baxter. 

@jordancarlos

@thezog

episodes.title: Go Crazy Lenny Schultz!
episodes.summary: Lenny Schultz takes Ku on the journey of his career from the 1950's to present day. He regales the time he spent with Robin Williams, Andy Kaufman, Sam Kinison and Mitzi Shore. He is an outrageous act who has been on the Merv Griffen Show, The Tonight Show with Johnny Carson, The Ed Sullivan Show, Laugh-In, etc.

episodes.title: Il Bambino TJ Del Reno
episodes.summary:
TJ Del Reno and Ku invent a new dating app based on the length of time it takes to close the deal and debate whether getting free stuff as a girl is worth all the harassment. TJ Del Reno is a NYC comedian and host of Unlimited Lives Radio. You can hear his voice on cartoons Three Delivery and Yu-Gi-Oh 5D and the video game Bully. 

@TJDelReno

episodes.title: The Michael Panzeca Virus
episodes.summary:
Michael Panzeca and Ku talk about the Jaws themed Ron Bennington Show, a misplaced campfire that changed his life, and his motorcycle tour on his Harley Soft Tail Deluxe. Michael Panzeca is a comedian who also conducts group therapy for addicts at Recovery Unplugged. 

@MikeyComic

episodes.title: A Sheba, Gideon and Ruth Walk Into A Bar Mitzvah
episodes.summary:
Sheba Mason and Ku talk about getting scolded for laughing at a restaurant, the parable of Gideon and Ruth, and high school shenanigans. 

@ShebaMason

episodes.title: Simpsons Writer Bill Oakley Plus Po Ku
episodes.summary:
Bill Oakley joins the Ku's to talk about how he developed his sense of humor, how he came up with the Malibu Stacy vs. Lisa episode, and the amount of freedom he was given as a writer on the Simpsons. Po Ku is a visual artist and is part of the original Ku and the Gang. Bill Oakley is a writer for the Simpsons, Futurama, and Mission Hill. 

@ThatBillOakley 

@PoKuPuns

episodes.title: Freddy Stebbins and His Infamous Syllabus
episodes.summary:
Freddy Stebbins joins Ku this week to talk about growing up in Miami in the eighties, what makes Ku tough, and Cubans. Freddy is a comedian whose voice you have heard at Dr. Doom and McAlligots Pool at Universal Studios and on Travel Channel's Get Packing. Freddy is also a Sociology professor at the country's largest college. 

@FreddyStebbins

episodes.title: Imagine All the Sheeple
episodes.summary:
Imagine reminisces about the Laugh Lounge, gives advice on working clean and then does the unthinkable... he calls Ku classy. Imagine is a comedian who hosts a weekly show in the Bronx at Havanna Café. 

@4imaginewhat

episodes.title: The Talking to James Davis Gave Us
episodes.summary:
James Davis joins Ku this week to talk about why he don't dabble in groupie sex, black culture, and his new Comedy Central Show Swagasaurus. James Davis is a comedian you've seen on Who's Got Jokes, MTV's Wild'n Out with Nick Cannon and Real Husbands of Hollywood. 

@theejamesdavis

episodes.title: Chaunte Wayans is Sans Swordplay
episodes.summary:
Chaunte Wayans talks about growing up a Wayans, what Ku couldn't do right on the Wild'n Out set, and one of her first lesbian encounters. Chaunte Wayans is a comedian who has been on MTV2's Wild'n Out and Fifty Shades of Black. 

@cwayans

kuandthegang@gmail.com

episodes.title: The Doug Benson and Bert Kreischer Backstage Rampage
episodes.summary:
Bert Kreischer explains the origins of the hashtag BertIsFat, there's a call to action to tweet Tom Segura #TomIsFat and a sober Doug Benson tells us who he wishes would do Getting Doug with High. 

@BertKreischer

@DougBenson

@bertcast

@GettingDoug

Kuandthegang@gmail.com

episodes.title: Stripclubs in a Nutshell with Del Harrison
episodes.summary:
Del Harrison talks to Ku about why she chose to be a celibate stripper, self affirmations to maintain your self esteem and why guys with resting bitch face are not marriage material. 

@iamdelharrison

kuandthegang@gmail.com

episodes.title: The Jewish Eeyore Falls Through a Trap Door
episodes.summary:
Aiko Tanaka joins Ku this week for a brief vocabulary lesson, tales of child labor, and how an addiction to compliments can lead to danger. 

@aikotanaka 

kuandthegang@gmail.com

episodes.title: The Hullabaloo Over Kenny Woo
episodes.summary:
Kenny Woo talks to Ku about what it was like being a comedy superstar in jail, where to hide your stash, and what trailer babies are. Woo is a comedian from Harlem who you may have seen on Turnt Up! Komedy, in the Bahamas, Dominican Republic or all over New York City. 

@comedianwoo1

episodes.title: Chris Redd Hot Silly Schlepper
episodes.summary:
Chris Redd and Ku talk about tom boyishness, how he fixed his stuttering through rap, and humbleness. Aiko Tanaka joins us towards the end. Chris Redd is a comedian you may have seen in Never Stop Never Stopping, Empire, and Last Laff. 

@Reddsaidit

kuandthegang@gmail.com

episodes.title: PK the Pinche Kimchi on North Korea
episodes.summary:
PK and Ku talk about North Korean refugees, religious cults, and the rampant violence in Korean households. PK is a comedian, founder of the Asian Talent Show Kollaboration and Co-Founder of LINK - Liberty in North Korea. He also hosts a podcast called Pinche Kimchi.

@Channelpktown 

kuandthegang@gmail.com

episodes.title: Lahna Turner A New Leaf
episodes.summary:
Lahna Turner joins Ku this week to talk about divorce, how she became Whasian, and being on diaper duty. Lahna Turner is a comedian you may have seen on her HULU One Hour Special So I Wrote A Song About It, Comedy Central, or on tour with Ralphie May.

@LahnaTurner

episodes.title: What Would You Do For An Aiko Bar?
episodes.summary:
Aiko talks to Ku about how she got kids at school to stop bullying her, her first impression of American culture when she moved to the States, and what life was like as a model. Aiko Tanaka is a comedian who has been on MTV's The Grind, Soul Train, The Howard Stern Show, Late Night with Jay Leno, and The Fast & The Furious: Tokyo Drift. Before she started comedy, she also had a modeling career so make sure you google image her while you listen.  “

@AikoTanaka

episodes.title: Ian Edwards Scissor Hands
episodes.summary:
Ian Edwards and Ku share their stories of dealing with flooded homes, exchange travel tips, and test out Rich Vos' oriental optical theory. Ian Edwards is a comedian you've seen on HBO's Def Comedy Jam, P. Diddy Presents the Bad Boys of Comedy, Punk'd, Tangerine, the Joe Rogan Experience and much more. 

@IanEdwardsComic

episodes.title: The Voice of Godfrey
episodes.summary:
Godfrey and Ku talk about his experience working with Bill Cosby and which podcast Obama will do when he leaves office. They then go into a German-Chinese-Russian character. Godfrey is a Nigerian-American comedian who has been on Zoolander, Soul Plane, Original Gangstas and Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn. This podcast was recorded in the home of a modern-day Pippi Longstocking. 

@GodfreyComedian

episodes.title: Mammary Lane with Carole Montgomery
episodes.summary:
Carol Montgomery talks about when she performed in Korea and what the DMZ was like. They talk about why older people wake up so early and the stigmas associated with being a dirty comic. Carol Montgomery has been on Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn, Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen and Funniest Mom in America. 

@nationalmom

episodes.title: Chris Murphy Bedside Stories
episodes.summary: Chris Murphy talks about how he survived cancer, being a comedy coach, and getting laid in his single room occupancy. Chris Murphy is a NYC comedian and comedy coach who has been seen on Comedy Central's Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn and Evening at the Improv on A & E.

episodes.title: Ralph Sutton Pushes Ku's Buttons
episodes.summary:
Ralph Sutton and Nick Alexander join Ku this week to talk about where her oversized ego comes from and the process of leaving a cult. One of them could've sworn Ku was hitting on him when they first met. Discussion ensues. Ralph Sutton is the host of the SDR Show, The Tour Bus, and Shiprocked. Nick Alexander is a NYC comedian who you may have seen in a club or Red Oaks. 

@iamralphsutton

@nickofcomedy

episodes.title: Sheba The Love Baby Mason
episodes.summary:
Sheba Mason is a NYC comedian and the daughter of comedian Jackie Mason. She was born out of wedlock to playwright Ginger Reiter, making headlines back in the eighties. She regales Ku about the time she bumped into her dad at a diner. She is joined by her mother Ginger who wrote the play The Jackie Mason Musical. 

http://www.shebamason.com

http://www.twitter.com/shebamason

episodes.title: A Dose of Vitamin Jay Davis
episodes.summary:
Jay Davis and Ku talk about where to take a dump if you have a hot roommate, how Christianity gets in the way of getting girls, and why he tumbled in the dryer as an adolescent. Jay Davis is a comedian who has been on HBO's Tourgasm with Dane Cook, The Playboy Morning Show, and Celebrity Poker Live. 

http://www.twitter.com/jaydaviscomedy

episodes.title: Lloyd Floyd - The Man Of 1,036 Voices
episodes.summary: Lloyd Floyd and Ku talk about the sheep's meadow in central park and whether the illuminati is real. Lloyd Floyd also does his impression of a jaded Israeli physician, their friend Mark Crystal and Darth Vader. Lloyd Floyd is the voice of Luke Skywalker for LucasArts video games for Star Wars: The Force Unleashed and Star Wars: Empire at War and the voice of the Joker for the new Super Friends.

episodes.title: David Feldman The Longest Shit Talking Record Holder
episodes.summary:
David Feldman and Ku talk about why water fountains should be segregated by gender, if it's bad for dogs to eat cat poo, and how shocked everyone was when Reagan won the presidency. Stu Kamens also makes an appearance via telephone. David Feldman has written on the Jack and Triumph Show, The Burn with Jeff Ross, Real Time with Bill Maher, and is the host of his own podcast The David Feldman Show. 

http://www.twitter.com/david_feldman_

episodes.title: Bert Kreischer is One Spicy Bulimic
episodes.summary:
Bert Kreischer and Ku bond over their rambunctious laughs, dare devil personalities, and indifference over being the butt of a joke. Bert Kreischer is a stand-up comedian and host of Bert the Conquerer on the Travel Channel, the basis for the movie Van Wilder, and the host of the Bertcast podcast. 

@bertkreischer

episodes.title: Kevin Brennan is White Patrice
episodes.summary:
Kevin Brennan and Ku talk about growing up in large families, why he no longer dates Asians and what got him into self-bondage.  Kevin Brennan has been on Comedy Central, Opie and Jimmy, has his own HBO special and is the host of the critically acclaimed podcast Misery Loves Company. 

@kevinbrennan666

episodes.title: Krystyna Hutchinson of Guys We Fucked
episodes.summary:
Krystyna Hutchinson and Ku bitch about the omission of female orgasms from sex ed programs, what waters down real racism and being loud sneezers. Krystyna Hutchinson is a NYC comedian and the co-host of the Guys We Fucked podcast.

http://www.twitter.com/krystynahutchinson

episodes.title: Steven Scott the Friar
episodes.summary:
Steven Scott joins Ku to talk about the Friars Club, being the son of news correspondent Marvin Scott, and what it's like being surrounded by Koreans in New Jersey. Steven Scott is a comedian who has made numerous appearances on NBC, CBS, FOX, VH1, MTV, and Comedy Central.

http://www.twitter.com/stevenscottlol

episodes.title: Joey Diaz from The Church of What's Happening Now
episodes.summary: Joey Coco Diaz and Ku talk auditions, priorities, and kidnapping. Joey Coco Diaz is a comedian who has been on Maron, Baseketball, The Longest Yard, Taxi, My Name is Earl and the Joe Rogan Experience. He hosts his own podcast called The Church of What's Happening Now.

episodes.title: Lenny Marcus from Misery Loves Company
episodes.summary:
Lenny Marcus explains Kevin Brennan's resting bitch face and why he doesn't meet audience members after shows. Lenny Marcus is a NYC based comedian who has been on David Letterman, Louie, and the Nightly Show with Larry Wilmore. He is also the co-host of the supremely popular podcast Misery Loves Company. 

http://www.lennymarcus.com

http://www.twitter.com/lennymarcusnyc

episodes.title: Anthony Cumia from O and A
episodes.summary:
Anthony Cumia let Ku sit in his seat at his studio to interview him about his morning shit, air conditioning, censorship, and his upcoming trial. Anthony Cumia is a radio broadcaster most notably known from his days at Sirius as Opie and Anthony. He now runs his own show and podcast network at anthonycumia.com. 

Watch the taped podcast on video: https://youtu.be/T9hIdq9O6M0

http://www.anthonycumia.com

episodes.title: Kareem Green Got Chinky Eyes
episodes.summary:
Kareem Green and Ku talk about growing up in foster care, butt deficits, and white people lips. Kareem Green has been on Russell Simmons presents The Ruckus, Who's Got Jokes, and BET's Comicview. No relation to Tom Green. 

www.kareemgreen.com

www.twitter.com/kareemgreen

episodes.title: What that Brian Redban Do
episodes.summary: Redban joins Ku this week to talk about the benefits of legalizing weed, the definition of soaking, and the early days of getting his podcast off the ground. Brian Redban is the founder of the Deathsquad podcast, host of What Brian Redban Do and is the frequent co-host of the Joe Rogan Experience.

episodes.title: Jessimae Peluso from MTV's Girl Code
episodes.summary:
Jessimae Peluso and Ku sit down to talk about Jessimae's nickname growing up, the sex ed rumors Ku started in grade school, and why neither of them want kids. Jessimae Peluso is a stand-up comedian from MTV's Girl Code, Gotham Comedy Live, Chelsea Lately, and Last Call with Carson Daly. She is also the host of the Sharp Tongue Podcast. 

http://www.jessimae.com

http://www.twitter.com/JessimaePeluso

http://www.instagram.com/jessimaepeluso

episodes.title: Jon Gabrus gets High and Mighty
episodes.summary:
Gabrus and Ku discuss marriage, atheism, their group Wild’n Out audition, and how to tell a guy is cheating on you with the help of a graduated cylinder. Gabrus can be seen on MTV2’s Guy Code, Wild’n Out, TruTV’s Santas in The Barn and is the host of his own podcast High and Mighty. Ku invites her male listeners to participate in the first Ku and the Gang experiment. Measure your cum loads throughout the day and report back the differences in load size. Email results to kuandthegang@gmail.com.

http://twitter.com/jongabrus

http://www.instagram.com/gabruspics 

http://headgum.com/podcasts/high-and-mighty/

http://twitter.com/estherkuku

http://www.instagram.com/estherkuku

http://www.youtube.com/oldiesparodies

http://www.funnyku.com

episodes.title: Richard Kline - Larry from Three's Company
episodes.summary:
Richard Kline joins Ku this week to discuss working on a massively popular sitcom, serving in the Vietnam War and getting struck by lightning. Richard Kline is a brilliant comedic actor who has been in numerous movies and TV shows including Three's Company, I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry, Beverly Hills Ninja, etc.  

http://www.richardkline.tv

episodes.title: Jessica Porter - The Healthy Hip Chick
episodes.summary:
Jessica Porter, the delightful Canadian Macrobioticsist, joins Ku this week for a mind-blowing discussion on how to quiet your conscious mind in order to tap into the subconscious. They discuss the dangers of caffeine consumption, the ability for trauma to be passed through genes, and the benefits of meditation. Jessica Porter is the author of The Hip Chick's Guide to Macrobiotics and The MILF Diet. She also co-wrote The Kind Diet with Alicia Silverstone. 

http://www.hipchicksmacrobiotics.com

episodes.title: Von Decarlo Speaks Fluent Man
episodes.summary:
Von Decarlo and Ku talk about why she never farted in front of Patrice O'Neal. She also talks about the struggles of living in the legacy of Patrice and continuing the legacy since his passing. 

www.speakfluentman.com

episodes.title: Marina Franklin and Her Sexcapades
episodes.summary:
Marina Franklin joins Ku to discuss whether one can ever be done with therapy, why Chicago isn't the nice city everybody thinks it is, and sex. Marina has been on Last Comic Standing, The Chappelle Show, Women Who Kill, Louie, Trainwreck, Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn, Craig Ferguson's Late Late Show, Showtime at the Apollo, Premium Blend, and John Oliver's New York Stand Up Show. 

www.marinafranklin.com

episodes.title: Luis J Gomez Thinks He's White
episodes.summary:
Luis J Gomez attempts to turn his episode into a production meeting. Gomez and Ku talk about physical violence in the home, having white friends, and podcast wars. Luis J Gomez has been on NBC's Last Comic Standing, Gotham Comedy Live, is the co-host of Legion of Skanks Podcast and has his own Sirius XM Show on Channel 93. 

www.gomezcomedy.com

www.RealAssDude.com

episodes.title: Wil Sylvince Gets Crunchy
episodes.summary:
Wil Sylvince and Ku talk shit, masturbation, and what it was like being Patrice O'Neal's roommate. Wil Sylvince is the founder of the Comedy Short Cuts Film Festival. He has appeared on Comedy Central, HBO's Def Comedy Jam, Big Black Comedy Show, etc. This episode was taped at Show Briz Studios in NYC.

www.wilsylvince.com

www.twitter.com/wilsylvince.com

Patrice O'Neal's Pittens Episode: https://youtu.be/lGGrw7b9xrM

episodes.title: Danny Lobell of Modern Day Philosophers
episodes.summary:
Danny Lobell was one of the original comedy podcasters before podcasting became a thing. He and Ku talk about why he hated Asians as a kid, what happened to her rice cooker and what it was like to be next door neighbors in Brooklyn.  The episode ends with Ku's recording of her parody of My Ding A Ling called Hey Larry King! 

Shop Amazon: http://amzn.to/1kzmfuZ

www.moderndayphilosophers.net

www.dannylobell.com

episodes.title: Jason Andors Couldn't Smell My Poo
episodes.summary:
Jason and Ku talk about how to effectively avoid getting STD's and what kind of a loser it must take to do comedy. Jason Andors is a comedian born and raised in NYC and has been on Whiteboyz in the Hood, Gotham Comedy Live, and P. Diddy Presents the Bad Boys of Comedy.   

Shop on Amazon: http://amzn.to/20gXZP7

www.jasonandors.com

www.twitter.com/jasonandors

episodes.title: Michelle Buteau's Take on the  Red Light District
episodes.summary:
Ku and Buteau talk about how to be promoted to night time whore in the red light district, what makes light skinned dog owners racist, and getting DNA tests. You may know Buteau from her Comedy Central Half Hour Special, Big Morning Buzz Live with Nick Lachey, Best Week Ever, @midnight, Craig Ferguson, etc.

episodes.title: Welcome to Ku and the Gang!
Guys We F****d's Corinne Fisher
episodes.summary:
Corinne Fisher and Ku discuss what they would have become if stand-up comedy did not exist. Corinne comes from a family obsessed with horror films and Ku comes from a family obsessed with gambling. They discuss whether giving head is humiliating or fun. Corinne Fisher is one half of the revolutionary anti slut-shaming podcast Guys We Fucked. The Guys We Fucked girls discuss rape, abortion, pedophilia, etc. in so much depth, they've shot to the top of the iTunes charts.

episodes.title: Marshall Brandon and Jackson Comedian Jackson
episodes.summary:
Marshall Brandon and Jackson Comedian Jackson podcast with Ku right after getting off stage. Jackson and Ku talk dental and car hygiene. Marshall Brandon shares what it's like to get mistaken for Chicago Bears receiver Brandon Marshall. Marshall shares his story about his long-lost tooth. Marshall Brandon has been on BET's Comic View, Bill Bellamy's Who's Got Jokes, Mixtape Comedy Show, Comedy Central and ESPN.

episodes.title: Edgar Rivera - Pothead in a Cop's Body
episodes.summary:
Edgar Rivera reveals to Ku that his ex-wife turned into a lesbian. She turns his confession into an opportunity to roast him. He describes the first time he was on stage at a strip club. This episode was taped in the car from Brooklyn to Manhattan. Ku shares her two worst times she was blazed out of her mind. They both do impressions of Smokey Suarez. Edgar is originally from Ciales, Puerto Rico and now lives in the Bronx.  

If you enjoyed this episode, please click on the Amazon link below. A percentage of proceeds from your purchase on Amazon will go towards the production of future episodes. Thank you!  

www.twitter.com/EdgarDaComedian

episodes.title: Nikki Carr Becomes a Pregnant Man
episodes.summary:
This was Ku's first time in a hotel room alone with a real life lesbian and boy was it monumental. Nikki Carr is a stand-up comedian from the Bronx who became a comedian in order to [spoiler alert] find her long-lost children. Ku and Carr reminisce on shows they've done including the one they just finished in Amherst, MA. You may know her from Last Comic Standing, BET's Comicview, One Mic Stand with Kevin Hart, Martin Lawrence's 1st Ammendment Stand Up, and Showtime's Stand Up for Family.

To send Nikki Carr fan mail / donations:

episodes.title: Danny Cho of Ktown Cowboys
episodes.summary:
Danny Cho is a stand-up comedian who grew up in a liquor store in Los Angeles. Ku and Cho theorize on how to get his parents high, they discuss breaking up with a Korean girl who needed a green card and South Korean weed laws.  

If you enjoyed this episode, please click on the Amazon link below. A percentage of proceeds from your purchase on Amazon will go towards the production of future episodes. Thank you! 

www.ktowncowboys.com

www.twitter.com/dannycho

episodes.title: Karlous Miller is Straight
episodes.summary:
Esther Ku and Karlous Miller discuss pooing on airplanes, role-playing during sex, what makes Asians so weird, why we don't need comedy contests and who stole his rhymes on Wild'n Out. This episode was originally recorded in front of a live Periscope audience. Karlous Miller is a stand-up comedian from Mississippi based in Atlanta. He has been on Wild’n Out, BET’s Comic View, Last Comic Standing, Bill Bellamy’s Who’s Got Jokes, The Mo’nique Show, and Off the Chain. 

 

If you enjoyed this episode, please click on the Amazon link below. A percentage of proceeds from your purchase on Amazon will go towards the production of future episodes. Thank you!

episodes.title: Thomas "Wipe Til It's White" Dale
episodes.summary:
Esther Ku and Thomas Dale discuss their morning log regimen, east vs. west coast comedy scenes, sexism in religions, dating anecdotes and educating youth on gay culture. Thomas Dale is a stand-up comedian from New York now living in Los Angeles. He’s been on Chelsea Lately, The Late Show With Craig Ferguson, HBO Canada’s Funny as Hell Series, and VH1’s 100 Sexiest Celebrities.

episodes.title: Yoshi Obayashi loses his shit
episodes.summary:
Comedian Esther Ku interviews comedian Yoshi Obayashi. They discuss poo experiments, Korean and Japanese culture, prostitution, pornography, and stand-up comedy. Yoshi Obayashi is a stand up comedian living in Los Angeles. He worked as a porn editor for several years often giving boxes of free porn to his comedian comrades. He worked as a consultant on Dave Attell's show Dave's Old Porn and has been on Comics Without Borders.

If you enjoyed this episode, please click on the Amazon link below. A percentage of proceeds from your purchase on Amazon will go towards the production of future episodes. Thank you! 

@YoshiObayashi
